trans-unit.source: Identifies which of the nonpublic <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute" /> members are accessible by transparent code within the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Identifica qual dos membros <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute" /> não públicos estão acessíveis por código transparente dentro do assembly.

trans-unit.source: Types or members marked with the <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> attribute and the <xref:System.Security.SecurityTreatAsSafeAttribute> attribute can be accessed by types and members within the assembly that are marked with the <xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Tipos ou membros marcados com o <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> atributo e o <xref:System.Security.SecurityTreatAsSafeAttribute> atributo pode ser acessado por tipos e membros dentro do assembly que são marcados com o <xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityTreatAsSafeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.SecurityTreatAsSafeAttribute" />.
